## About

`metid` is a R package which is used for metabolite identification based on in-house database and public database based on accurate mass (m/z), retention time (RT) and/or MS2 spectra.

<img src="man/figures/workflow_metid.jpg" align="middle" alt="" width = "80%"/>

## Installation

You can install `metid` from [Github](https://github.com/tidymass/metid).

```{r, eval=FALSE}
if(!require(devtools)){
install.packages("devtools")
}
devtools::install_github("tidymass/metid")
```

`tinytools` is a dependent package for `metid`. Please install it too.

```{r, eval=FALSE}
if(!require(devtools)){
install.packages("devtools")
}
devtools::install_github("tidymass/tinytools")
```

## Usage

Please see the [Get started](https://tidymass.github.io/metid/articles/metid.html) page to get the instruction of `metid`.
